attributes.title: horrible app, i almost died !!!!!
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app to support our lovely president, #cheetofriends4life . but as soon as i opened the app he started flirting with me , asking me for my phone number. excuse me sir i am a minor. i am honestly flabbergasted that the orange cheeto king himself would want my phone number. but honey that’s a case . i politely declined. but at the moment a rock flew through my window and mike pence crawled through on all fours . it was so scary. he then proceeded to bash me in the head with a shovel and throw my body out the window. he cut off all my limbs and left me there . luckily my mom can outside to pee on the porch and saw me . i am writing this review from the hospital (using my voice obviously) . anyway please keep your children off this app if you want them to keep their limbs . i no longer support you he orange cheeto king and i very upset about this 😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP✨🦋
attributes.review: so I downloaded this app just to see what it was and immediately after I did my phone died👁👄👁when it was at 70% and I thought it was just a coincidence but right after that my entire family had their phone unexpectedly die then next second I know MY DOG DIED🐶😱rip bongo😭😢🥺but other than that the only other thing that happened was my hair fell out and then I started getting random spam numbers🧚🏼💋then I deleted it and the things continued to go on so I had to get a new phone but everything is fine now👁👅👁byeeeee

attributes.title: trump has a small penis.
attributes.review: when i got this app i expected to be delighted. instead i got yelled at by trump saying that i am stupid and ugly. after that a bunch of people started yelling it to me, and saying that “they don’t wear masks for the same reason they don’t wear underwear, things gotta breathe.” and i respectfully shouted back to them “i don’t put my knee on people’s necks for the same reason i stand as an ally for BLM, things gotta breathe.” after that, they stormed my house with a bunch of MAGA merch that i did not want. 0/5 would NEVER download this app or even vote for trump again.

attributes.title: The higher Shreks
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to appreciate my favorite ✨Oompa Loompa✨.  However👀, I felt like someone was viewing me 😱 my heart was pumping fast. I sprinted away from my house 🏃‍♀️💨🏠I was dreaming, hoping I ran from the creature that saw me 😨. As I gasping for air, I felt liked someone called my name and i saw Shrek right in front of me 😳. My mind exploded 🤯. “What is Shrek-Kun doing here.”💖👄💖😦He told me that my roblux 💵 have vanished 😓. I screamed, “Who ToOk my rObLUx.”🤬Then it hit me, I was shocked, driven to fear...the Oompa Loompa took my money 😡. Seconds Minutes, hours past and I never was reunited with my roblux💵😞

attributes.title: #president-p$$y-grabber
attributes.review: I downloaded this absolute masterpiece of an app because I love our president and his orangie-ness. I love how honest he is, and that he wants to make America great again! He is NOT what everyone says he is. He is kind, smart, not racist, kinda thicc,and overall he’s my daddy. I love my daddy, my super hero! The way he grabs women so elegantly with his little baby carrot fingers makes me wet. He is indisputably the best president we have ever had. Best at drinking water, making weird faces, and allowing 130,000 of his citizens to die from a deadly virus. What else is there to say? Is is TREMENDOUS! Vote Noah Schnapp 2020

attributes.title: Yeah❤️
attributes.review: So today I downloaded the app because I wanted to support my favorite ✨ c h e e t o ✨ but when I opened the app I herd a knock at my door 🚪 when I opened the door there where two men in black suits standing there 🕴🏻🕴🏻I said “who are you” then they said “we are the secret service” then they threaten to kill my grandmother 🔪 👵🏻 then I asked who send them and they said “Donald J. Trump” then I said “who❤️” then they said “Mr. Oompa Lupa🧡🏳️‍🌈” then I understood who they were talking about 😹 so Donald Duck 🦆 thread my grandmother’s life so that’s why I rated this app one ⭐️ S T A R ⭐️ anyways what y’all want from Walmart 🧿 👄 🧿

attributes.title: Trump took away my gun 😢😢
attributes.review: Can’t believe this guy! I was walking on the street open carrying my AR-15 assault rifle like you’re totally supposed to be allowed to do, and Trump pulled up in his Prius with blacked out windows and took my gun, but before he did that he got out of his car, spilling empty bottles of Tryptophan and Fentanyl all over the side walk, and started ranting about the Mexicans. I went to the beach last weekend, so maybe I’m a little more brown than he’s used to? Idk man I’m just mad the president pulled up just to take my gun. Oh yeah also he’s cool with child murder.

attributes.title: App frustration.
attributes.review: Hi there.  This app is extremely confusing.  It doesn’t work good at all.  I keep getting some messages ever since I downloaded it and put in my number despite saying I didn’t want that.  I couldn’t use any of the apps features without giving my number and then all of a sudden I have ten messages about winning a prize from the trump administration. I just wanted to get information and instead I’m stuck with all these messages I have to pay for and then delete.  Very frustrating

attributes.title: how will he get a kiss kiss?? very ugly .
attributes.review: this app has given me a TRAUMATIC experience. it’s disgusting i cannot even bars to look at it anymore w out having to gag and ball my eyes out!! the colors don’t match and who is this orange fat man?? i am just so confused it is giving me anxiety and i will not sit and let an app give me a full on mental breakdown w out doing something abt it. if i could rate this app a 0 star it would get just that. it’s disgusting to have to look at this, take this app down otherwise i will be calling corporate immediately 👁👄👁👏🏼❤️😻😽💘😌✨ xoxo. gen z:)
